name: International Conference on COVID-19 Pandemic and Public Health System (COVIDCon 2021)
content: International Conference on COVID-19 Pandemic and Public Health System (COVIDCon 2021) invites you to submit your research papers and case studies on or before 18th March 2021 to present online. The conference theme is “Roles, Responses, Reflections and Future Challenges of COVID-19” The following are the conference tracks for abstract submission. • Response to the pandemic – review of the role and responses of the Health System and in particular of Health personnel. • Risk communication – How well did we communicate the information of this disease to the public. • Innovative technologies developed and practiced to limit the impact of the pandemic – vaccines, IT tools and others • Impact of COVID-19 and other aspect of health and disease (reproductive health, mental health, non-communicable disease, health programs and other) • How to handle the next epidemic and pandemic Please click this link for more information https://worldhealthconferences.com/call-for-papers/
